## Config.getPredefinedDeclaration() function

Returns the [system configuration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md) declaration for the specified predefined system configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getPredefinedDeclaration(name: PredefinedSystemConfiguration, initParams?: ISystemConfigurationInitParams): Result<ISystemConfiguration>;
```

**Returns:**

Result&lt;ISystemConfiguration&gt;

`Success` with the [system configuration](./ts-res.config.model.isystemconfiguration.md) declaration if successful, `Failure` with an error message otherwise.
